price: 163. En jullie God is één God, er is geen Die het recht tot aanbidding heeft behalve Hij, de Barmhartigste, de Genadevolle.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun lā ilāha illā huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
